plot: Arid Tsavo National Park in Kenya, examines the short ribbon of water teeming with life in the midst of a dry and thirsty land, a place called Mzima.
title: Mzima: Portrait of a Spring
plot_es: Arid Tsavo National Park in Kenya, examines the short ribbon of water teeming with life in the midst of a dry and thirsty land, a place called Mzima.
plot_en: Arid Tsavo National Park in Kenya, examines the short ribbon of water teeming with life in the midst of a dry and thirsty land, a place called Mzima.
